name: From the Roots (Paz, l.wasabi.l, pomipomie, ValeVoice)
name_original: From the Roots (Paz, l.wasabi.l, pomipomie, ValeVoice)
description:
Space bar to start. Arrow keys to move and jump.

Game made during the Global Game Jam Feb 2023.

Theme: Roots

2D Background artis and animations: Paz Cravero

https://pazcravero.itch.io

https://www.linkedin.com/in/paz-cravero/

https://www.behance.net/PazCravero

https://www.linkedin.com/in/victoriacarballozink/

Music & SFX: Luján Hernández

https://lwasabil.itch.io/

https://www.instagram.com/l_wasabi_l/?hl=es-la

Voice acting: Valeria Pozo

https://valevoice.itch.io

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCB5Zpwouoxbb07b98a8qR6Q

Programming: Xiomara Badano

https://pomipomie.itch.io

https://github.com/pomipomie

Thank you for playing From the roots ♥ Take care of your mental health.
